title: The Hidden Room
subtle: Adventure (fiction), 1,193 words, Level S (Grade 3), Lexile 640L, Fiction Series
description: In this book from The Hollow Kids Series, Qynn and Sarah are trying to find out more information about the mysterious items they found when Sarah's Aunt Terra comes in and takes the items away! What new secrets will the girls learn when they follow Aunt Terra to retrieve the items? As students join Qynn and Sarah in their adventure, they will also have the opportunity to learn how to analyze a plot and use commas to separate dialogue.
highFrequencyWords: beckons, bizarre, charitable, combing, creepy, divulge, immigrated, reveal, Victorian
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Commas                : Understand and use commas to separate dialogue
awareness: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
